video_prompt: The video features a cartoon mouse running along a path covered with autumn leaves in a forest setting. The mouse has large, expressive eyes with long eyelashes, a small nose, and a friendly expression. It has brown fur with a lighter patch on its chest and a tuft of hair on its head. The camera follows the mouse as it moves forward, capturing the peaceful autumn day in the forest.

speech_prompt.speaker: the mouse
speech_prompt.text: Hedra has brought us to life with the most advanced character.
